name: Whack Your Ex - Official
description: Relieve tension by tapping on items to Whack Your EX!  Updated with new features exclusively for mobile, this classic has been played by millions as a flash game and now it's an app!  Also as you'll remember the original game had all the items bunched together at the bottom but not anymore!  For easy access we've put her items on the right and his on the left.  There's some brand new surprises too!
